proposals.title: Systematic self-improvement loop
proposals.description: Build automated cycle: review performance → research best practices → propose changes → measure outcomes
proposals.success_criteria: Loop runs weekly, generates 1+ actionable proposal per month, 50%+ proposals show measurable improvement

proposals.title: Batch cron outputs
proposals.description: Space cron deliveries 2+ hours apart. Combine related outputs into single message.

proposals.title: Space Friday crons
proposals.description: Moved Cross-Domain Science to 2pm, Fragility Index to 4pm (was both 10am)
